patthana8.71:1.1: Naniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana8.71:2.1: Naaniyyānikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.71:3.1: Naniyyānikañca naaniyyānikañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyyāniko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.71:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
